[Like us on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greencloudvps)

Hi LET,
It has been fun for the last 10 days with our Ryzen offers: https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/172554/greencloud-ryzen-threadripper-10gbps-port-nvme-4-0-usa-eu-apac/p1
We still have a few stock left that will be set expired at the end of this month so grab them while you can :)

We have been testing new hardware recently with Ryzen Threadripper, Xeon Gold and now we have EPYC™ in Coventry, UK!

**Node specs:**

- AMD EPYC™ 7502P
- DDR4 ECC
- Enterprise Intel NVMe 4.0 RAID-1

Now is the time for the EPYC™ deals!

**EPYC-1: $20/year - [ORDER NOW!](https://greencloudvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=642 "ORDER NOW!")**

    - IPv4: 1

    - Linux OS
